text: Now That's What I Call Music! 17 was released on November 2, 2004. The album is the 17th edition of the Now! series in the United States. It debuted at number one on the Billboard 200, becoming the second consecutive number-one album in the series and the sixth overall.Margo Whitmire. " 'NOW 17' Trumps Kelly, Jay-Z At No. 1". Billboard.com. November 10, 2004. Now! 17 has been certified 3x platinumRIAA Gold and Platinum Search for NOW! Platinum Albums and features two Billboard Hot 100 number-one hits, "Lean Back" and "Goodies". ==Track listing== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2004) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2005) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| US Billboard 200 | 13 |- ! scope="row"| US Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums (Billboard) | 40 |} ==References== Category:2004 compilation albums 017 Category:Capitol Records compilation albums
title: Now That's What I Call Music! 17 (American series)
